CustomField.description: For multi-turn agent responses. Allows for formatting. Reference https://api.slack.com/reference/surfaces/formatting
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do not include images. You can use markdown: https://api.slack.com/reference/surfaces/formatting. For links to salesforce, use either the hyperlink button or markdown. For a link to a canvas in slack, you can just paste the url directly as text.
CustomField.label: Agent Response (RTF)
